name: lifehack-Makeyourlifesimple
0:
”Alexa, ask life hack for learning”
”Alexa, ask life hack for traveling time savers”
”Alexa, ask life hack for technology tricks”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: life hack
des: People want to do things as easy as possible since they live. This Skill gives you perfect lifehacks to keep your life as simple as possible. It provides you lifehacks for a lot of categories like food, cleaning, healthy life, children, traveling, learning, technology, money and even more. These hacks are great to fill up your energy and having a better life.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
